price: Alif – Laam – Raa. Woi yε Nwoma no mu nsεm no bi, ne Qur’aan a ԑda adi pefee no.
arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi waqur'ānin mubīnin
